front.title: Selective Synchronization for RPKI to Router Protocol

abstract.t: The RPKI-to-Router (RTR) protocol synchronizes all the verified RPKI data to the router. This document proposes to extend the existing RTR protocol to support selective data synchronization. Selective synchronization can avoid some unnecessary synchronization overhead. The router can obtain only the data that it needs, and does not need to save the data that it does not need.
